title: I wont to sever change need help
body: so im in Australia and my ping/ms is on 30 to 35 if I sever change to na what will my ping be like .

replies.body:
200-250. It's playable but doesn't feel as smooth as the OCE experience. (I get 10-14ms). NA also has a lot more game modes such as an active team builder and normal drafts. 

To test your ping just run a speedtest to one of the Chicago servers.
can you plz send me a link as I don't know were to go lol
it used to be 200-300 but since the server move its more 280-420

It's highly dependent on your connection/routing to the Chicago servers. I was getting a max of 250ms when I played, and before the servers changed it used to be at 160-170.

For speedtest, just go to speedtest.com and then from the world view find Chicago (think of it as a geography lesson :D). Really sorry about the late reply as you've probably figured it out by now, anyway, but if not then GL on the swap.
speed test is so inaccurate for league, riot even said so, you try it, you speed test for Chicago and get 90 ms then play and get 300
it'll be really good. lots of people do it
But why? Playing at 30 ping is perfect for online gaming, 200 ping is a nightmare, anything over 150 starts to become unplayable.
bad ping player telling me to go kill me self hmmm
Since the move to chicago servers, i get 280 ping on NA from melbourne.
